actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act with regard to faculty.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act to specify that no faculty member or group of faculty members in any educational institution shall be deemed to be managerial or supervisory employees solely because the faculty member or group of faculty members participate in decisions with respect to courses, curriculum, personnel, or other matters of educational policy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act with regard to faculty.
